reviews.review_msg: He is horrible prof. Very rude and unpleasant. Likes to talk and doesn't like to listn to other opinions. He is liberal and likes to show off who he knows. I don't recommend him to anyone. I didn't learn anything in his course. It was waste of my time and money.
SUCH a slack teacher. Easy A!!! Very anti-bush...and opinionated. If you are against his opinions....dont let him know.
he's awesome, knows what he's talking about, but is very anti-Bush
he sux unless you agree with him, if you dont, dont let him know
He is a wicked professor.....i liked him a lot
If he likes you...smooth sailing! show up, do the readings and pretend to be interested if you want to do well
Excellent lecturer.  And he has a certain cuteness.
